summary: Dashboard UI improvements: adjust field card attributes layout to 3 columns in a single row and support user-selectable light-palette background colors for field cards.

existing_features.title: Update the Dashboard FieldCard attribute list (Urgency, Value, Interest, Influence, Duration) so the attributes are laid out in a 3-column responsive grid, and on large screens they should remain on a single horizontal row (no wrapping) by using a horizontal scroll or other non-wrapping layout when needed.
Add a user-selectable background color option for Dashboard FieldCards using a light color palette, and apply the selected background color to the FieldCard container in the dashboard.
Define a consistent light-palette background color set (IDs + labels) for field card backgrounds and expose it in the frontend where the background selection UI is implemented.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update dashboard field card attributes to a 3-column layout with all attributes on the same row.
Add user-selectable background color for dashboard field cards (light palette options).

projectName: Update dashboard FieldCard attribute layout to 3 columns and add user-selectable light background colors
